entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Fire Breath
entries: The dragon uses Fire Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Wenn dem Drachen ein Rettungswurf misslingt, kann er stattdessen einen erfolgreichen Rettungswurf wählen.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: Der Drache ist im Vorteil bei Weisheitsprüfungen ({@skill Perception}) und bei Rettungswürfen gegen {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned} und Stoßen {@condition unconscious}. Für jeden Kopf, den der Drache mehr als einen hat, erhält er eine zusätzliche Reaktion, die nur für {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks} verwendet werden kann.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 3}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Fire Breath
entries: The dragon uses Fire Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The thessaltrice has eight cockatrice heads. While it has more than one cockatrice head, the thessaltrice has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessaltrice takes 3 or more damage in a single turn, one of its cockatrice heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two cockatrice heads for each of its cockatrice heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessaltrice regains 3 hit points for each cockatrice head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessaltrice sleeps, at least one of its cockatrice heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessaltrice makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Cockatrice Bites, one with its Maw, and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Flurry of Cockatrice Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 +1}) piercing damage piercing damage for each cockatrice head it has, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessaltrice can't use its Tail Pincer tack on another target.

trait.name: Multiple Serpent Heads
entries: The thessalmera has eight serpent heads. While it has more than one serpent head, the thessalmera has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessalmera takes 5 or more damage in a single turn, one of its serpent heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalmera regains 5 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessalmera sleeps, at least one of its serpent heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessalmera makes four attacks: one with is Flurry of Serpent Bites, one with its Bite, one with its Claws, and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Flurry of Serpent Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage for each serpent head it has.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 5 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Hiebschaden.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessalmera can't use its Tail Pincer attack on another target.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The thessalhydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Serpent Heads
entries: The thessalhydra has eight serpent heads. While it has more than one serpent head, the thessalhydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessalhydra takes 10 or more damage in a single turn, one of its serpent heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalhydra regains 10 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each serpent head the thessalhydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}. The thessalhydra can only use its Serpent Bite attack for these extra {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessalhydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessalhydra makes as many Serpent Bite attacks as it has serpent heads. It then makes two additional attacks. one with its Maw and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Serpent Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessalhydra can't use its Tail Pincer attack on another target.

action.name: Spit Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The thessalhydra spits a gob of acid at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Multiple Serpent Heads
entries: The thessalgorgon has eight serpent heads. While it has more than one serpent head, the thessalgorgon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessalgorgon takes 5 or more damage in a single turn, one of its serpent heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalgorgon regains 5 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessalgorgon sleeps, at least one of its serpent heads is awake.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the thessalgorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is prone, the thessalgorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessalgorgon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Serpent bites, one to Gore or with its Hooves, and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Flurry of Serpent Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage for each serpent head it has.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessalgorgon can't use its Tail Pincer attack on another target.

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The thessalgorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the tendriculos remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal mound of vegetation.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The tendriculos regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is touching at least 5-feet square of vegetation. This feature consumes the vegetation. If the tendriculos takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tendriculos's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tendriculos makes three melee attacks. two Tendril attacks and one Bite or Swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The tendriculos has two tendrils, each of which can grapple only one target. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 12; 20 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the tendriculos, which can grow a replacement tendril as an action.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tendriculos makes one Bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tendriculos, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the tendriculos's turns. A tendriculos can have up to four Small creatures, two Medium, or one Large creature swallowed at a time.

If the tendriculos takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the tendriculos must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tendriculos. If the tendriculos dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The tendriculos exhales poisonous splinters in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) piercing damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Battle Concentration
entries: The templar has advantage on Constitution saving throws that it makes to maintain concentration on a spell when it takes damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the grand templar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the grand templar casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grand templar makes two melee attacks, or makes one melee attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Heavy Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant (good) or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic (evil) damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The grand templar casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: {@i *The grand templar casts this spell on itself before combat.}

legendary.name: Move
entries: The grand templar moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The grand templar makes a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The grand templar casts {@spell sacred flame}, {@spell toll the dead|XGE}, or {@spell word of radiance|XGE}.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The grand templar uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Battle Concentration
entries: The templar has advantage on Constitution saving throws that it makes to maintain concentration on a spell when it takes damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The templar makes two melee attacks, or makes one melee attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Heavy Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The templar casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the sphinx moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the sphinx can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sphinx makes three attacks: one Gore attack and two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bellow (2/Day)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical bellow. Each time it bellows before finishing a long rest, the bellow is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 60 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the bellow must make a saving throw.

action.name: First Bellow
entries: Each creature that fails a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. A {@condition deafened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Second Bellow
entries: Each creature that fails a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. A {@condition deafened} creature is {@condition stunned} and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Raking Pounce (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The sphinx moves up to its speed and makes two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The archon doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

trait.name: Discorporating Dive (3/Day)
entries: If the archon is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an armblade attack, the archon can force the target to make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage and the target is disintegrated if this damage leaves it with 0 hit points. A disintegrated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. In addition, a disintegrated humanoid's soul is sent to a prison in the Seven Heavens of Celestia. Until its soul is released or a wish spell is used, the creature cannot be restored to life. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two Armblade attacks.

action.name: Armblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus.name: Armblades
entries: The archon transforms the flesh of its forearms, hardening and sharpening them into the form of divine, fiery swordblades, or vice versa. The archon's armblade attacks are considered magical.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sword archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fearsome Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Eladrin hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: Der Eladrin teleportiert sich bis zu 30 Fuß in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The eladrin adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Summer Eladrin, Elder

trait.name: Fearsome Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Eladrin hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: Wenn der Eladrin einen Zauber wirkt und von einem gegnerischen Zauber {@spell counterspell} unterbrochen wird, gilt die Stufe des Zaubers als 3 Stufen höher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiery Smite (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action when the eladrin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it deals an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage and the target has disadvantage to being frightened until the end of the eladrin's next turn.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: Der Eladrin teleportiert sich bis zu 30 Fuß in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The eladrin adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendaryHeader: The eladrin gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The eladrin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Der Eladrin bewegt sich bis zur Hälfte seiner Geschwindigkeit, ohne zu provozieren {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Wrathful Glare
entries: The eladrin targets one frightened creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the eladrin deals damage to it, or until the end of the eladrin's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The eladrin makes a weapon attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The giant's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +15 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) thunder damage.

action.name: Lightning Storm {@recharge 5}
entries: A storm cloud instantly appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 120-foot radius, centered on and directly above the giant. The giant chooses up to three points it can see under the cloud. A bolt of lightning flashes down from the cloud to each point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one lightning bolt strike is affected only once. If a creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. The storm cloud dissipates at the end of the turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):

legendary.name: Thunder Step
entries: The giant casts thunder step.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Thunderbolt (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage and 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Quarterstaff attacks.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Summon Earth Elemental (1/Day)
entries: The giant summons {@dice 1d4} Medium Earth elementals (MME page 91) or 1 Large Earth Elemental. The elementals appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the giant and act as its ally. The elementals act right after the giant on the same initiative count and fight until they are destroyed. They remain for 1 hour, until they or the giant dies, or until the giant dismisses them as an action.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When the giant is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Earthsing (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The giant performs a magical song or tune and targets a 10-foot square section of earth it can see within 60 feet of it. The ability functions like a move earth spell but only affects a 10-foot square area and lasts for 1 minute.

Alternatively, the giant can choose to animate the 10-foot square section of earth, transforming it into a Large humanoid form not unlike an {@creature earth elemental}. For the purposes of combat, the animated earth has the same stats of an earth elemental. It moves up to 30 feet, and makes one slam attack at one creature of the giant's choice within 5 feet of the animated earth.

The giant can use a bonus action to cause it to move 30 feet to another spot within 60 feet of it. As part of the same bonus action, it can cause the animated earth to make one slam attack at one creature within 5 feet of it.
The giant can use its reaction to make the animated earth perform {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.
The animated earth remains for 1 minute, until the giant dies or until it dismisses it as an action.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes three Greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the attack roll succeeds by 5 or more, the target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When the giant is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The stone giant champion of ogrémoch's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

legendary.name: Move
entries: The giant moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Earth Stomp
entries: The giant stomps the ground, creating an earth tremor that extends in a 15-foot radius. Other creatures standing on the ground in that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Greatclub (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant attacks with its Greatclub.

trait.name: Joyful Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition charmed} creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Eladrin hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: Der Eladrin teleportiert sich bis zu 30 Fuß in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

monster.name: Spring Eladrin, Elder

trait.name: Joyful Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition charmed} creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Eladrin hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: Wenn der Eladrin einen Zauber wirkt und von einem gegnerischen Zauber {@spell counterspell} unterbrochen wird, gilt die Stufe des Zaubers als 3 Stufen höher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eladrin makes three weapon attacks. The eladrin can cast one spell in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: Der Eladrin teleportiert sich bis zu 30 Fuß in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

reaction.name: Instinctive Charm (3/Day)
entries: The eladrin tries to magically divert an attack made against it, provided that the attacker is within 30 feet of it and visible to it. The eladrin must decide to do so before the attack hits or misses. The attacker must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker targets the creature closest to it, other than eladrin or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendaryHeader: The eladrin gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The eladrin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Der Eladrin bewegt sich bis zur Hälfte seiner Geschwindigkeit, ohne zu provozieren {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Captivate
entries: The eladrin casts charm person or Tasha's hideous laughter.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The eladrin makes a weapon attack.

monster.name: Spiderstone Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 70 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Der Golem ist immun gegen jeden Zauber oder Effekt, der seine Form verändern würde.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Golem ist bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte im Vorteil.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Die Waffenangriffe des Golems sind magisch.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The golem can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the golem knows the exact location of any creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The golem ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes four Scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Web Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem exhales poisonous webbing in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 7d8}) poison damage and be {@condition restrained} by webbing. A creature that starts its turn restrained takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 17} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 10 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Smoke Form
entries: The paraelemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the paraelemental hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paraelemental makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Suffocate {@recharge 5}
entries: The paraelemental fills the lungs of its victims with smoke. Each creature in the paraelemental's space must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and begins to choke and suffocate. A suffocating creature is {@condition incapacitated} and can survive a number of rounds equal to its Constitution modifier. When a creature runs out of breath, it drops to 0 hit points and is dying at the start of its next turn, and can't regain hit points or be stabilized until it can breathe again. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't suffocate.

trait.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard can detect an electrical discharge within 240 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shocker lizard makes three attacks: one with its Bite, one with its Claws, and one with its Tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Chain Lightning Shock
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shocker lizard uses Lightning Shock, the shocker lizard uses its Lightning Shock, if available.

trait.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard can detect an electrical discharge within 120 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shocker lizard makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Chain Lightning Shock
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shocker lizard uses Lightning Shock, the shocker lizard uses its Lightning Shock, if available.

trait.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard can detect an electrical discharge within 60 feet of it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Chain Lightning Shock
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shocker lizard uses Lightning Shock, the shocker lizard uses its Lightning Shock, if available.

trait.name: Rational Mind
entries: The shedu has advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Sure-footed
entries: The shedu has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shedu makes two Hoof attacks.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The shedu magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: he shedu moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Medium or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the shedu enters must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the shedu's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage. If the shedu remains in the prone creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the shedu. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 17} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the shedu and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Mind Hammer (3/Day)
entries: The shedu targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and psychically slams the creature's mind. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 32 ({@damage 7d8}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The sarimanok sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sarimanok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sarimanok's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sarimanok makes three attacks. one with its Beak, one with its Talons, and one with its Prismatic Tail.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Prismatic Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}Roll a {@dice d8} to determine which color tail affects the target.

items.name: 1. Red.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage.

items.name: 2. Orange.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage.

items.name: 3. Yellow.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage.

items.name: 4. Green.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage.

items.name: 5. Blue.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage.

items.name: 6. Indigo.
items.entry: The target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition petrified} for 24 hours. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 7. Violet.
items.entry: The target must make {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be transported to another plane of existence of the GM's choosing. (Typically, a creature that is on a plane that isn't its home plane is banished home, while other creatures are usually cast into the Astral or Ethereal planes.) A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

items.name: 8. Special.
items.entry: The target is struck by two tails. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.

action.name: Sarimanok's Crow (1/Day)
entries: The sarimanok emits a magical crow. Each creature of the sarimanok's choice that is within 120 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Sarimanok's Crow gains 10 temporary hit points and advantage on initiative rolls, becomes immune to being charmed and {@condition frightened}, and can't be put to sleep by magic for 1 minute.

items.entry: 35 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage.

items.name: 5. Blue.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage.

items.name: 6. Indigo.
items.entry: The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition petrified} for 24 hours. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 7. Violet.
items.entry: The target must make {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be transported to another plane of existence of the GM's choosing. (Typically, a creature that is on a plane that isn't its home plane is banished home, while other creatures are usually cast into the Astral or Ethereal planes.) A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

items.name: 8. Special.
items.entry: The target is struck by two tails. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.

action.name: Sarimanok's Crow (1/Day)
entries: The sarimanok emits a magical crow. Each creature of the sarimanok's choice that is within 120 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Sarimanok's Crow gains 5 temporary hit points and advantage on initiative rolls, becomes immune to being charmed and {@condition frightened}, and can't be put to sleep by magic for 1 minute.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sarimanok casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The sahuagin can use its action to polymorph into a Large shark-humanoid hybrid or into a Large shark, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sahuagin makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace its Bite attack with Worry.

action.name: Bite (Shark or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the sahuagin can't Bite attack another target.

action.name: Claw (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail (Shark or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target it isn't grappling with. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Worry (Shark or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: A creature the sahuagin is grappling must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the sahuagin's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The sahuagin moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The sahuagin makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Jaws (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sahuagin makes a Bite attack or uses Worry.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws or Spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Drown Foes {@recharge 5}
entries: The sahuagin targets up to 3 enemies it can see within 30 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or begin choking. The choking creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn, when the effect ends on it. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sahuagin casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):

monster.name: Sahuagin Duke

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sahuagin makes three attacks: one with his Bite and two with his Claws or Trident.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage and the target can't take reactions until the start of the sahuagin's next turn.

action.name: Forked Lightning {@recharge 5}
entries: The sahuagin unleashes a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of his choice that he can see within 60 feet of him. Two bolts then leap from that target to as many as two other targets, each of which must be within 15 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts. Each target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the sahuagin's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

legendaryHeader: The sahuagin can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The sahuagin regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The sahuagin moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The sahuagin makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Trident (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sahuagin makes a Trident attack.

legendary.name: Water Jet (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Ranged Weapon {@action Attack}: {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone} if it fails a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw. If the target fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the sacred fist is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sacred fist makes three Unarmed Strike or three Dart attacks. Or it can make one Unarmed Strike and cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage + 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant, fire, or necrotic damage (if Sacred Flames is active). If the target is a creature, the sacred fist can choose one of the following additional effects:

items: The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (sacred fist's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the sacred fist's next turn.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Sacred Flames (3/Day)
entries: The sacred fist causes its hands and feet to be wreathed in divine energy, which each hit of its unarmed strike dealing an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant (good), fire (any), or necrotic (evil) damage. Once per turn while sacred flames is active, when the sacred fist hits a creature with an unarmed strike, it can expend one spell slot to deal radiant, fire, or necrotic damage (whichever is active) to the target, in addition to the unarmed strike's damage. The extra damage is {@dice 2d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of {@dice 5d8}. This effect lasts for 1 minute.

bonus.name: Inner Armor (1/Day)
entries: The sacred fist invokes its inner tranquility, gaining advantage on all Saving Throws. The effect lasts for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the sacred fist deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by 16 ({@damage 1d10 + 11}). If the damage is reduced to 0, the sacred fist catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the sacred fist has a hand free.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sacred fist casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magische Dunkelheit behindert den gefallenen Archon nicht {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der gefallene Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

trait.name: Unerring Assay
entries: The fallen archon can unerringly identify the alignment of any creature it can see within 60 feet of it. Masking one's alignment, such as the use of a ring of mind shielding, will not deter the fallen archon's unerring assay.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Der gefallene Archon teleportiert sich mitsamt seiner Ausrüstung und den Kreaturen, die er gepackt hat, auf magische Weise bis zu 60 Fuß weit in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ravager archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: Der Drache hat einen Vorteil bei Geschicklichkeitsproben ({@skill Stealth}), um sich in felsigem Gelände zu verstecken.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Solange er sich im Sonnenlicht befindet, hat der Drache einen Nachteil bei Angriffswürfen und bei Weisheitsprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf das Sehen beziehen.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales psychic energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 11} Intelligence saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions, until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the priest fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the priest casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The priest has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

bonus.name: Divine Eminence
entries: The priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant (good) or necrotic (evil) damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The priest casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: {@i *The priest casts this spell on itself before combat.}

legendary.name: Move
entries: The priest moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The priest casts sacred flame or word of radiance.

legendary.name: Quarterstaff
entries: The priest attacks with its Quarterstaff.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The priest casts {@spell cure wounds}, dispel magic, guiding bolt, {@spell hold person}, or mass healing word, if available.

trait.name: Archery Fighting Style
entries: The ranger gains {@hit 2} bonus to attack rolls it makes with ranged weapons (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the ranger fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multiattack Defense
entries: When a creature hits the ranger with an attack, the ranger gains a {@hit 4} bonus to AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Favored Foe (3/Day)
entries: When the ranger hits a creature with an attack roll, it can mark the target as its favored enemy for 1 minute or until it loses its concentration (as if it were concentrating on a spell). The first time on each of its turns that it hits the favored enemy and deal damage to it, including when it marks it, it can increase that damage by 4 ({@damage 1d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ranger makes two Shortsword attacks or two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

entries: The ranger moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the pegataur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Spear attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The pegataur has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Threatening
entries: Creatures provoke an {@action opportunity attack} from the pegataur when they move 5 feet or more while within the pegataur's reach, and if the pegataur hits a creature with an {@action opportunity attack}, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the current turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes three attacks: two with its Spear and one with its Hooves.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack and the target is marked until the end of the pegataur's next turn. This effect ends early if the pegataur is {@condition incapacitated} or it dies, or if someone else marks the target. While it is within 5 feet of the pegataur, a creature marked by the pegataur has disadvantage on any attack roll that doesn't target the pegataur.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

entries: The pegataur makes a melee weapon attack against a creature marked by it if the creature dealt damage to anyone other than the pegataur during the last turn. The pegataur's melee weapon attack has advantage on the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to the target.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of the pegataur that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The pegataur targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the pegataur, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Charge

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the archon is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Teleport

action.name: Petrifying Eye Rays (6/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours, until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The owl archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the orog fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orog uses Luthic's Wrath. It then makes two Pike attacks.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Luthic's Boon {@recharge 6}
entries: Each orc that doesn't have all of its hit points of the orog's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Luthic's Boon gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the orog's next turn.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

bonus.name: Hand of Luthic
entries: The orog targets one allied orc it can see within 30 feet of it that doesn't have all of its hit points. If the target can see or hear the orog, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the attack roll. If the attack hits, the target gains 5 temporary hit points.

reaction.name: Brace
entries: When a creature the orog can see moves within reach of its melee weapon, the orog can make one melee weapon attack against the creature.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The orog moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Pike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The orog makes a Pike attack.

legendary.name: Terrify Foes (Costs 1-3 Actions)
entries: The orog targets up to 3 creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the orog, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the orog's next turn. A target is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} in this way. It costs 1 legendary action per target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orog uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes two Greataxe attacks. It can replace one of its Greataxe attacks with Command Ally.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Command Ally
entries: The orog targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the orog, the target can use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to three allies within 60 feet of this orog that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

monster.name: Orog Hag of Luthic

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orog makes two Claw attacks, or four Claw attacks if she has fewer than half of her hit points remaining.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blood Storm {@recharge 6}
entries: A churning red cloud forms, centered on a point the hag can see within 60 feet of it and spreading to a radius of 30 feet. Blood instantly rains from the cloud and soaks everyone it hits. Each creature under the cloud when it appears must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw against disease. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and becomes {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. The cloud dissipates at the end of the turn.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The orog casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The orog can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The orog regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The orog moves up to half her speed.

legendary.name: Luthic's Embrace
entries: The orog targets a creature she can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage and gains disadvantage to attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of the orog's next turn.

legendary.name: Double Claw (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The orog makes two Claw attacks.

monster.name: Orog Battle Priestess of Luthic

trait.name: Voice of Luthic
entries: Provided the orog isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an ally that starts its turn within 30 feet of the orog and can hear the orog gains advantage on saving throws against being charmed and {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the orc casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orog makes two Warhammer attacks. Alternatively, it can make one Warhammer attack and cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Cave Mother's Wrath (1/Day)
entries: Each allied orc within 30 feet of the orog that doesn't have all of its hit points can use its reaction to make one melee attack. Any creature hit by an ally while affected by Cave Mother's Wrath has disadvantage on saving throws made against the orog's spells until the end of the orog's next turn. The orog can then make one Warhammer attack as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The orog casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The orog can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The orog regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The orog moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Warhammer
entries: The orog attacks with its Warhammer.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The orog uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the orcwort remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Rooted
entries: The orcwort has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would pull, push, or knock it prone.

trait.name: Wortling Link
entries: The orcwort can see through and communicate telepathically with any of its wortlings within 10 miles of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orcwort makes three Tendril attacks. It can use Bite or Swallow in place of one Tendril attack.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage and if the target is Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The orcwort has six tendrils, each of which can grapple only one target. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 16; 30 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the orcwort, which can use an action to grow a replacement tendril.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature it is grappling with. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition incapacitated}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The orcwort makes one Bite attack against a target. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends.
