entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kuo-toa casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The kuo-toa moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Malediction
entries: The kuo-toa casts bane, blindness/deafness, command or {@spell hold person}.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kuo-toa makes a melee or ranged attack.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the kubot can use her action to polymorph into her Fiend Form or back into her true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the kubot appears as a female vampire with enormous flowing hair. Her statistics, other than her Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. She reverts to her true form at dawn or if she dies. While transformed, the kubot also gains the following features.

items: The kubot's creature type changes to fiend.
The kubot has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When she makes a melee weapon attack, the kubot gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The kubot can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
If the kubot starts her turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, she becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The kubot has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Rapid Aging
entries: The kubot ages 1 year each day.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kubot makes two attacks. two with its Dagger (humanoid form) or one with her Hair Wrap and one with her Claws (fiend form).

action.name: Hair Wrap (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target can't breathe, is {@condition blinded}, restrained, and the kubot can't use her Hair Wrap against other targets.

action.name: Claws (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Consume Energy (Fiend Form Only)
entries: The kubot draws energy from a creature it is grappling with. The target makes a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The kubot regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. If a creature dies from this action, the kubot gains the age of the creature. The kubot's age can't go below 18 years old.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The korred has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Command Hair
entries: The korred has at least one 30-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Medium or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition grappled} by the rope (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes {@condition incapacitated}.

A rope of korred hair has AC 15 and 15 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while it has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The korred casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 11}):

1: {@spell conjure elemental} (as 5th-level spell; {@creature dust mephit} or {@creature gargoyle} only)

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The korred has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The korred makes two attacks with its Greatclub or hurls two Rocks. It can use Hair Slam or Fool's Dance in place of one of its attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, or 20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Hair Slam
entries: The korred slams a creature grappled by its hair into another creature it can see within 30 feet of it or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, or 20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground, and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the korred's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +11 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, or 25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Fool's Dance (1/Day)
entries: The korred chooses up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must immediately use its reaction to perform a comical dance (shuffling, tapping its feet, and capering) and move as far as half its speed allows away from the korred. This movement will provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}. On a successful save, the target is unaffected. Creatures that can't be {@condition charmed} are immune to this feature.

action.name: Command Hair
entries: The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. Alternatively, the korred can command its own hair, which can magically grow up to 30 feet in length to entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. In either cases, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition grappled} by the rope or hair (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes {@condition incapacitated}.

A rope of korred hair has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while it has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

bonus.name: Rhyme of Calling
entries: The korred targets up to two creatures within 30 feet of it that can hear it. Each target can use their reaction to move up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The korred casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 15}):

1e: {@spell conjure elemental} (as 6th-level spell; {@creature galeb duhr}, {@creature gargoyle}, {@creature earth elemental}, or {@creature xorn} only)

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The korred has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The korred makes two attacks with its Greatclub or hurls two Rocks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Command Hair
entries: The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition grappled} by the rope (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes {@condition incapacitated}.

A rope of korred hair has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while it has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The korred casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

1e: {@spell conjure elemental} (as 6th-level spell; {@creature galeb duhr}, {@creature gargoyle}, {@creature earth elemental}, or {@creature xorn} only)

trait.name: Lead The Charge
entries: If the kobold moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a melee attack on the same turn during the first round of combat, the kobold can target up to four allied kobolds within 60 feet of it that can hear it. Each target can use their reaction to move up to their speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the kobold fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Solange er sich im Sonnenlicht befindet, hat der Kobold einen Nachteil bei Angriffswürfen und bei Weisheitsprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf das Sehen beziehen.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Der Kobold hat einen Vorteil bei einem Angriffswurf gegen eine Kreatur, wenn sich mindestens ein Verbündeter des Kobolds im Umkreis von 5 Fuß um die Kreatur befindet und der Verbündete nicht {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kobold makes two Spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must also succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Kurtulmak's Divine Fury (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The kobold magically infuses its attacks with divine energy. For 1 minute, the first creature the kobold hits on each of its turns with a weapon attack takes 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Zealous Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The kobold unleashes a battle cry infused with divine energy. Up to ten other creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it that can hear it gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: Der Kobold passt seine Geschwindigkeit an.

legendary.name: Command Kobold
entries: The kobold targets one allied kobold it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the kobold, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or move up to its speed.

legendary.name: Kurtulmak's Glare
entries: The kobold targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the kobold until the end of kobold's next turn.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Solange er sich im Sonnenlicht befindet, hat der Kobold einen Nachteil bei Angriffswürfen und bei Weisheitsprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf das Sehen beziehen.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Der Kobold hat einen Vorteil bei einem Angriffswurf gegen eine Kreatur, wenn sich mindestens ein Verbündeter des Kobolds im Umkreis von 5 Fuß um die Kreatur befindet und der Verbündete nicht {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The kobold deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the kobold that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the kobold doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Hurl Grenade (3/Day)
entries: The kobold hurls a grenade at a point within 30 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Set Trap (5/Day)
entries: The kobold can discretely place a mechanical trap of its choice (see below) on a surface (such as a section of floor, a wall, a staircase, or a table) or within an object that can be closed to conceal the trap (such as a chest, door, or window) within 5 feet of it. If it is a surface, the trap can cover an area of the surface no larger than 10 feet in diameter.
The trap is hidden, requiring a {@dc 13} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) to find it or a {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check to spot it.

For traps placed on a surface, the trap is triggered when a surface within the area is touched or stepped on, removing another object covering it, or manipulating an object that holds it. For traps within an object, the trap is triggered when the object is opened or manipulated.

When the kobold lays a trap, it chooses from one of the following options below for its effect. Once triggered, each creature within 10 feet of the trap is targeted by its effect, unless specified otherwise.

items.name: 1. Bear Trap.
items.entry: This trap can only be placed on a ground surface and only the creature that triggered it as affected. The target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage and is {@condition restrained}. The creature can make a {@dc 13} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check to escape the trap. If the check fails, the target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage. Until the creature regains all of its hit points, its walking speed is reduced by half.

items.name: 2. Flare Blast.
items.entry: Each target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute.

items.name: 3. Explosive Blast.
items.entry: Each target must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: 4. Poison Gas.
items.entry: Each target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

items.name: 5. Stink Cloud.
items.entry: The trap creates a 15-foot radius sphere of green, nauseating gas centered on the trap which lasts for 1 minute. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. Each target within the cloud must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw against poison. On a failed save, the creature spends its action that turn retching and reeling. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw. A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the cloud after 4 rounds. A strong wind (at least 20 miles per hour) disperses it after 1 round.

action.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the kobold can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The kobold moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cast Magical Trap
entries: The kobold casts grease, snare, or web.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kobold makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Set Trap (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kobold uses Set Trap, if available.

trait.name: Dragon's Friend
entries: The kobold has advantage on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks made to interact with dragons.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Solange er sich im Sonnenlicht befindet, hat der Kobold einen Nachteil bei Angriffswürfen und bei Weisheitsprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf das Sehen beziehen.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Der Kobold hat einen Vorteil bei einem Angriffswurf gegen eine Kreatur, wenn sich mindestens ein Verbündeter des Kobolds im Umkreis von 5 Fuß um die Kreatur befindet und der Verbündete nicht {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 1. Song of Dragon's Might
entries: Provided the kobold isn't {@condition incapacitated}, any ally that starts its turn within 30 feet of the kobold and can hear the kobold gains advantage on melee attack rolls and Strength ability checks until the start of its next turn.

action.name: 2. Song of Dragon's Fortitude
entries: Provided the kobold isn't {@condition incapacitated}, any ally that starts its turn within 30 feet of the kobold and can hear the kobold gains advantage on saving throws until the start of its next turn.

action.name: 3. Song of Dragon's Presence
entries: Provided the kobold isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the kobold and can hear the kobold must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the kobold's Song of Dragon's Presence for the next 24 hours.

bonus.name: Dragonsong
entries: The kobold can perform a song that lasts until the start of the kobold's next turn. The kobold can select from one of three effects:

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Aura of Conquest
entries: If the kobold isn't {@condition incapacitated}, a creature frightened of the kobold that starts its turn within 30 feet of the kobold takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and has its speed is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Der Kobold hat einen Vorteil bei einem Angriffswurf gegen eine Kreatur, wenn sich mindestens ein Verbündeter des Kobolds im Umkreis von 5 Fuß um die Kreatur befindet und der Verbündete nicht {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Solange er sich im Sonnenlicht befindet, hat der Kobold einen Nachteil bei Angriffswürfen und bei Weisheitsprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf das Sehen beziehen.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kobold makes two Spiked Club attacks.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the kobold's next turn.

action.name: Order of Dakarnok (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the kobold gain advantage to their first attack roll until the start of the kobold's next turn. Each enemy within 30 feet of the kobold must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Smite
entries: As a bonus action when the kobold hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage to the target. If the kobold expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra psychic damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Der Kobold wirkt einen der folgenden Zauber, wobei er Charisma als Zauberfähigkeit einsetzt (Zauberschutz {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} um mit Zauberangriffen zu treffen):

legendary.name: Charge
entries: Der Kobold passt seine Geschwindigkeit an.

legendary.name: Command Kobold
entries: The kobold targets one allied kobold it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the kobold, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or move up to its speed.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kobold uses Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Spiked Club (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kobold makes a Spiked Club attack.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parry and Counter
entries: The knight adds 3 to its AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, it must be able to see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the knight can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within its reach.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The knight moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The knight targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the knight, the target can use its reaction to make one melee weapon attack or move up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Intimidating Presence
entries: The knight targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the knight, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the knight for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to knight's Intimidating Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Greatsword (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The knight attacks with its Greatsword.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The ki-rin's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ki-rin makes two Hoof attacks and one Horn attack.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ki-rin casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The kapre has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kapre uses Smoke Breath, if available. It then makes three melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

action.name: Heavy Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Smoke Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The kapre exhales thick magical smoke in a 30-foot cube. The smoke spreads around corners. Unless noted otherwise, the smoke doesn't obscure vision and lasts for 1 minute or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. The kapre chooses from the following effects:

items.name: 1. Bewildering Smoke.
items.entry: Each creature that enters the smoke or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the creature's next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell without making a saving throw. The kapre doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

items.name: 2. Mirthful Smoke.
items.entry: Each creature that enters the smoke or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the creature's next turn. While {@condition charmed}, the target falls {@condition prone} and starts giggling uncontrollably, becoming incapacitated and unable to stand up. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn't affected.

items.name: 3. Obscuring Smoke.
items.entry: The area of the smoke is heavily obscured. The kapre can see normally while in the smoke.

items.name: 4. Stupefying Smoke.
items.entry: Each creature that enters the smoke or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma ability checks and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

entries: The kapre can only have 1 Smoke Breath effect at a time. If the kapre exhales a new Smoke Breath while a previous one still exists, the previous Smoke Breath immediately dissipates and ends. The kapre is immune to the effects of any kapre's Smoke Breath.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The kapre magically polymorphs into a Medium or smaller beast or humanoid, or back into its true form. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kapre casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The kapre has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kapre uses Smoke Breath, if available. It then makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Heavy Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Smoke Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The kapre exhales thick magical smoke in a 30-foot cube. The smoke spreads around corners. Unless noted otherwise, the smoke doesn't obscure vision and lasts for 1 minute or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. The kapre chooses from the following effects:

items.name: 1. Bewildering Smoke.
items.entry: Each creature that enters the smoke or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the creature's next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell without making a saving throw. The kapre doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

items.name: 2. Obscuring Smoke.
items.entry: The area of the smoke is heavily obscured. The kapre can see normally while in the smoke.

items.name: 3. Stupefying Smoke.
items.entry: Each creature that enters the smoke or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma ability checks and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

entries: The kapre can only have 1 Smoke Breath effect at a time. If the kapre exhales a new Smoke Breath while a previous one still exists, the previous Smoke Breath immediately dissipates and ends. The kapre is immune to the effects of any kapre's Smoke Breath.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The kapre magically polymorphs into a Medium or smaller humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kapre casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: Der Drache hat einen Vorteil bei Geschicklichkeitsproben ({@skill Stealth}), um sich in felsigem Gelände zu verstecken.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Solange er sich im Sonnenlicht befindet, hat der Drache einen Nachteil bei Angriffswürfen und bei Weisheitsprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf das Sehen beziehen.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Drache führt einen Bissangriff und zwei Klauenangriffe aus.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Psychic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions, until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Illithidrache ist bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte im Vorteil.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Illithidrache führt eine Tentakel-Attacke und zwei Klauen-Attacken durch.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) and must succeed on a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature that has a brain grappled by the illithidragon. {@h}The target takes 31 ({@damage 7d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the illithidragon kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The illithidragon magically emits psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The illithidragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Drache hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Drache führt einen Bissangriff und zwei Klauenangriffe aus.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hellfire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales hellfire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage and becomes vulnerable to fire damage until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Der Drache verwandelt sich auf magische Weise in einen Tiefling oder einen mittelgroßen Teufel. Er kann als Bonusaktion in seine wahre Form zurückkehren. Mit Ausnahme seiner Größe sind seine Statistiken in jeder Form gleich. Jegliche Ausrüstung, die er trägt oder mit sich führt, wird nicht verwandelt. Er kehrt in seine wahre Form zurück, wenn er stirbt.

bonus.name: Heated Body
entries: The dragon emits fire from its body. A creature that touches the dragon or hits it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it and the Heated Body is active takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage. The Heated Body remains until the dragon dies or until it dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Der Drache kann Tierlaute und humanoide Stimmen imitieren. Eine Kreatur, die die Geräusche hört, kann mit einer erfolgreichen {@dc 14} Weisheitsprüfung ({@skill Insight}) erkennen, dass es sich um Imitationen handelt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Drache führt einen Angriff mit Biss oder Schwanz und zwei mit seinen Klauen aus.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the dragon can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the dragon can't attack another target with its tail.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sticky, corrosive acid in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage immediately and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Der Drache kann seinen Atem 15 Minuten lang anhalten oder bis er seinen Säureatem einsetzt.

trait.name: Sand Camouflage
entries: Der Drache hat einen Vorteil bei Geschicklichkeitsproben ({@skill Stealth}), um sich in sandigem Gelände zu verstecken.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Drache führt einen Bissangriff und zwei Klauenangriffe aus.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales corrosive sand in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) acid damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two Greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus.name: Justice Strike (3/Day)
entries: When the archon hits a creature with a melee attack, the archon can deal extra damage depending on the target's alignment.

items.name: Any Evil:
items.entry: 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

items.name: Chaotic Neutral or Neutral:
items.entry: 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

items.name: Chaotic Good or Lawful Neutral:
items.entry: 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

reaction.name: Castigating Strike
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the archon deals damage to an ally, the archon makes a melee weapon attack against that creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The justice archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Hypnotic Sway
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the naga and the creature can see the naga, it must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw if the naga isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} for the duration. While {@condition charmed} by this spell, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0.
The effect ends if a hypnotized creature takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the naga until the start of its next turn, when it can avert it s eyes again. If it looks at the naga in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition unconscious} and is in a deep sleep. An {@condition unconscious} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the {@condition unconscious} creature takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake, it gains advantage on its saving throw.

action.name: Taunt (4/Day)
entries: The naga can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the naga, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring only verbal components and Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magische Dunkelheit behindert den gefallenen Archon nicht {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der gefallene Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes two Greatsword attacks, or makes one Greatsword attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 5 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Hiebschaden.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Der gefallene Archon teleportiert sich mitsamt seiner Ausrüstung und den Kreaturen, die er gepackt hat, auf magische Weise bis zu 60 Fuß weit in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

reaction.name: Castigating Strike
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the fallen archon deals damage to an ally, the fallen archon makes a melee weapon attack against that creature.

reaction.name: Injustice Strike (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, when the fallen archon hits a creature with a melee attack, the archon can deal extra damage depending on the target's alignment.
Any Good: 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.
Chaotic Neutral or Neutral: 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.
Chaotic Evil or Lawful Neutral: 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The injustice archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Illithidrache ist bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte im Vorteil.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage.If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}) and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature that has a brain grappled by the illithidragon. {@h}The target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the illithidragon kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The illithidragon magically emits psychic energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The illithidragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: While it's alive, the paraelemental generates an aura of bitter cold that fills the area within 10 feet of it. At the start of the paraelemental's turn, all nonmagical flames in the aura are extinguished. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the paraelemental takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paraelemental makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Winter's Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The paraelemental exhales icy shards in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage. If a creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it also suffers 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

monster.name: Ice Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Cold Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the golem's hit points reaches 0, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The golem can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

trait.name: Melt
entries: While in an area of extreme heat, the golem loses {@dice 1d6} hit points at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Der Golem ist immun gegen jeden Zauber oder Effekt, der seine Form verändern würde.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Golem ist bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte im Vorteil.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Die Waffenangriffe des Golems sind magisch.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last until the end of the ice golem's next turn.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem exhales magical frost in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) cold damage and is encased in ice for 1 minute. While encased, a creature is {@condition restrained}. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 17} Strength check, breaking the ice on a success. The ice can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 12; hp 25; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to cold, poison, and psychic damage). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't encased in ice.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hybsil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hybsil casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The archon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Greatsword.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The archon can use its action to polymorph into a humanoid or canine beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the archon's choice).

In a new form, the archon retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as its spellcasting ability:

trait.name: Battle Concentration
entries: The hobgoblin has advantage on Constitution saving throws that it makes to maintain concentration on a spell when it takes damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the hobgoblin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the hobgoblin casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two War Pick attacks or makes one War Pick attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Tiamat's Breath (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin chooses an energy type from acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The hobgoblin exhales energy of the chosen type in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) damage of the chosen damage type on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The hobgoblin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The hobgoblin casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: War Pick
entries: The hobgoblin makes a War Pick attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hobgoblin uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Aura of Tyranny
entries: An ally that is within 30 feet of the hobgoblin and can see and hear the hobgoblin and has less hit points than the hobgoblin has advantage to saving throws against being charmed and {@condition frightened}, provided that the hobgoblin isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two attacks. one with its Longsword and one with its Handaxe.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rally Allies (1/Day)
entries: Up to ten allies within 60 feet of the hobgoblin and can hear the hobgoblin gain advantage to attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn.

bonus.name: Nomog-Geaya's Command
entries: The hobgoblin targets one allied hobgoblin it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the hobgoblin, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the roll. If the target misses, it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Parry and Counter
entries: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, it must be able to see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the hobgoblin can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within its reach.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The hobgoblin moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Double Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hobgoblin makes two attacks. one with its Longsword and one with its Handaxe.

legendary.name: Terrify Foes (Costs 1-3 Actions)
entries: The hobgoblin targets up to 3 creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the hobgoblin, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the hobgoblin's next turn. A target is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} in this way. It costs 1 legendary action per target.

trait.name: Arcane Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Army Arcana
entries: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
entries: rWhen the hobgoblin makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two Longsword attacks or makes one Longsword attack and casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Incite Allies (1/Day)
entries: Up to three allies within 60 feet of the hobgoblin and can hear the hobgoblin can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee weapon attack.

action.name: 1. Chant of Cunning
entries: Provided the hobgoblin isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an ally that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hobgoblin and can hear the hobgoblin can take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

action.name: 2. Chant of Dread
entries: Provided the hobgoblin isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hobgoblin and can hear the hobgoblin must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the hobgoblin's Chant of Dread for the next 24 hours.

action.name: 3. Chant of Resolve
entries: Provided the hobgoblin isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an ally that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hobgoblin and can hear the hobgoblin gains advantage on saving throws against being charmed and {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn.

bonus.name: War Chant
entries: The hobgoblin performs a war chant that lasts until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn. The hobgoblin can select from one of three effects:

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):
will: {@spell booming blade|TCE} (extra {@dice 1d8} plus {@dice 2d8} if the target moves)

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the hobgoblin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes four attacks, each of which can be an Unarmed Strike or a Dart attack. It can also use Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the hobgoblin's next turn.

action.name: Dart
entries: Ranged Weapon {@action Attack}. {@hit 9} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shadow Jaunt
entries: The hobgoblin magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn. Both the space it is leaving and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The hobgoblin halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The hobgoblin must be able to see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):
will: {@spell booming blade|TCE} (extra {@dice 1d8} plus {@dice 2d8} if the target moves)

legendary.name: Shift
entries: The hobgoblin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The hobgoblin casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hobgoblin makes a melee or ranged weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hobgoblin uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the hobgoblin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the hobgoblin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the hobgoblin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes four attacks, two with its Sai and two of which can be an Unarmed Strike or a Dart attack. It can also use Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

action.name: Sai
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the hobgoblin's next turn.

action.name: Dart
entries: Ranged Weapon {@action Attack}. {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shadow Jaunt
entries: The hobgoblin magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn. Both the space it is leaving and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The hobgoblin halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The hobgoblin must be able to see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the hobgoblin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two Greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d6 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitated}.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The hobgoblin moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Intimidate Foe
entries: The hobgoblin targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the hobgoblin, it must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the hobgoblin until the end of the hobgoblin's next turn.

legendary.name: Tactical Command
entries: The hobgoblin targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the hobgoblin, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack, move up to its speed, or move up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Greatsword (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hobgoblin makes a Greatsword attack.

trait.name: Arcane Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Army Arcana
entries: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

trait.name: Forceful Magic
entries: When the hobgoblin hits a creature with a damaging spell attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 5 feet and is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the hobgoblin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the hobgoblin casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):
will: {@spell green-flame blade|TCE} (extra {@damage 1d8} melee to target creature and {@damage 1d8 + 3} to second creature)

legendary.name: Move
entries: The hobgoblin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Quarterstaff
entries: The hobgoblin makes a Quarterstaff attack.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The hobgoblin casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hobgoblin uses spellcasting.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Spiked Greatclub attacks.

action.name: Spiked Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Battle Cry (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the giant's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the giant's next turn. The giant can then make one attack as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The giant targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the giant, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

legendary.name: Lumber
entries: The giant moves up to 15 feet.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Overhead Smash (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The giant attacks with its Greatclub. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The {@condition unconscious} target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Terrify Foes (Costs 1-3 Actions)
entries: The giant targets up to 3 creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the giant, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened}. A target is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} this way. The effect lasts until the end of the target's next turn. It costs 1 legendary action per target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Raise Earth {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant causes up to five square columns of earth to burst from the ground it can see within range. Each column measures 5 feet square and has a height of up to 20 feet and must be contiguous with at least one other column. The ground where a column appears must be wide enough for its width, and it can target the ground under a creature if that creature is Medium or smaller. Each column has AC 5 and 50 hit points. When reduced to 0 hit points or after 1 minute has passed, a column recedes back into the ground.
If a column is created under a creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be lifted by the column. A creature can choose to fail the save.

If a column is prevented from reaching its full height because of a ceiling or other obstacle, a creature on the column takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition restrained}, pinched between the column and the obstacle. The {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to make a {@dc 14} Strength or Dexterity check (the creature's choice). On a success, the creature is no longer {@condition restrained} and must either move off the column or fall off it.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When the giant is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the giant gains advantage on its attack roll when it attacks while on a space that is at least 15 feet away from where it started its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage and if the target is standing on the ground and is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition restrained}. Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 15} Strength check to free itself or another creature from the javelin, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: When an enemy the giant can see ends its turn within 5 feet of it, the giant can move up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Battering Ram
entries: If the giant moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Bash attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Twin Howdahs
entries: The giant carries two compact forts on its back. Up to four Small or two Medium sized creatures can ride in each fort without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the giant, they must use spears or weapons with reach, and the target must be Large or bigger. Creatures in the fort have threequarters cover against attacks and effects from outside it. If the giant dies, a creature in the fort must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}. Regardless of its saving throw, a creature is placed in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the giant.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Bash attacks.

action.name: Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the giant can push the target up to 10 feet away if the target is Huge or smaller.

action.name: Block the Path
entries: Until the start of the giant's next turn, attack rolls against the giant have disadvantage, it has advantage on the attack roll it makes for an {@action opportunity attack}, and that attack deals an extra 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage on a hit. Also, each enemy that tries to move out of the giant's reach without teleporting must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of the giant's next turn.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The giant has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage, or 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Weighted Net
entries: The giant throws a weighted net at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 17} Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 10 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The giant adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the giant must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two melee attacks. It can replace one of its attacks with Ground Pound, if it is available.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ground Pound {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant slams its greatclub on the ground, triggering an earth tremor and violently pelting the area with debris. Each creature on the ground originating from the giant in a 15-foot cube must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. If a creature fails its save by 5 or more, it is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Lumber
entries: The giant moves up to 15 feet.

legendary.name: Kick
entries: The giant makes a Kick attack.

legendary.name: Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant attacks with its Greatclub or Rock.

legendary.name: Smash (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The giant attacks with its Greatclub. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. If the target fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also knocked {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the high priest fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Greater Spell Penetration
entries: When the high priest casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 5 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The high priest has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Quarterstaff
