entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant (good) or 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic (evil) damage.

bonus.name: Divine Eminence
entries: The high priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant (good) or necrotic (evil) damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the high priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The high priest casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The high priest moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The high priest casts sacred flame or word of radiance.

legendary.name: Quarterstaff
entries: The high priest attacks with its Quarterstaff.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The high priest casts banishment, {@spell cure wounds}, {@spell dispel magic}, or {@spell hold person}, if available.

monster.name: Hierophant of Annihilation

trait.name: Death Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the hierophant's eyes starts its turn within 40 feet of the hierophant, the hierophant can force it to make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw if the hierophant isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, unless it is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition. Otherwise, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) psychic damage on a failed save.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the hierophant until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the hierophant in the meantime, it must immediately make the saving throw.

Unless the hierophant already has three bodaks under its control, a humanoid creature slain by the hierophant's Death Gaze rises as a bodak at the start of the hierophant's next turn and is under the hierophant's control.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The hierophant's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hierophant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the hierophant casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The hierophant takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hierophant makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Vestigial Wing
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The hierophant magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus.name: Aura of Annihilation
entries: The hierophant activates or deactivates this feature. While active, the aura deals 10 necrotic damage to any creature that ends its turn within 40 feet of the hierophant. Undead and fiends ignore this effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hierophant casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The hierophant gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The hierophant regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The hierophant uses its teleport action.

legendary.name: Wing
entries: The hierophant attacks with its Vestigial Wing.

legendary.name: Stinger (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Melee Weapon {@action Attack}: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned}, the target is also {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success..

legendary.name: Withering Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature that the hierophant can see within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der Drache hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hellfire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales hellfire in a 15foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage and becomes vulnerable to fire damage until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Der Drache verwandelt sich auf magische Weise in einen Tiefling oder einen mittelgroßen Teufel. Er kann als Bonusaktion in seine wahre Form zurückkehren. Mit Ausnahme seiner Größe sind seine Statistiken in jeder Form gleich. Jegliche Ausrüstung, die er trägt oder mit sich führt, wird nicht verwandelt. Er kehrt in seine wahre Form zurück, wenn er stirbt.

bonus.name: Heated Body
entries: The dragon emits fire from its body. A creature that touches the dragon or hits it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it and the Heated Body is active takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage. The Heated Body remains until the dragon dies or until it dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magische Dunkelheit behindert den gefallenen Archon nicht {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Hellfire Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the fallen archon, or touches it or hits it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it and the Hellfire Aura is active takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

A creature that takes damage from the Hellfire Aura becomes vulnerable to fire damage until the start of its next turn. The Hellfire Aura remains until the fallen archon dies or until it dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The fallen archon doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der gefallene Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

trait.name: Discorporating Dive (3/Day)
entries: If the fallen archon is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an armblade attack, the fallen archon can force the target to make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage and the target is disintegrated if this damage leaves it with 0 hit points. A disintegrated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of black ash. In addition, a disintegrated humanoid creature has its soul funneled into the River Styx, where it's reborn instantly as a lemure devil. Until its soul is released or a wish spell is used, the creature cannot be restored to life. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes two Armblade attacks.

action.name: Armblade
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Der gefallene Archon teleportiert sich mitsamt seiner Ausrüstung und den Kreaturen, die er gepackt hat, auf magische Weise bis zu 60 Fuß weit in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

bonus.name: Armblades
entries: The fallen archon can transform the flesh of its forearms, hardening and sharpening them into the form of divine, fiery swordblades, or vice versa. The fallen archon's armblade attacks are considered magical.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hellblade archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magische Dunkelheit behindert den gefallenen Archon nicht {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The fallen archon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der gefallene Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes two attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Greatsword.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Der gefallene Archon teleportiert sich mitsamt seiner Ausrüstung und den Kreaturen, die er gepackt hat, auf magische Weise bis zu 60 Fuß weit in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The fallen archon exhales fire in a 15foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The fallen archon can use its action to polymorph into a humanoid or hell hound that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the fallen archon's choice).

In a new form, the fallen archon retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hell hound archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magische Dunkelheit behindert den gefallenen Archon nicht {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Der gefallene Archon hat einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Zauber und andere magische Effekte.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes three Buisine attacks, or makes one Buisine attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Buisine
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Der gefallene Archon teleportiert sich mitsamt seiner Ausrüstung und den Kreaturen, die er gepackt hat, auf magische Weise bis zu 60 Fuß weit in einen unbesetzten Raum, den er sehen kann.

action.name: Harbinger's Hymn {@recharge 5}
entries: The fallen archon plays its buisine to create a sound of utter horror and terrifying beauty. Each nonfiend creature within 120 feet that can hear the fallen archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature frightened in this way is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the fallen archon's Harbinger's Hymn for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Buisine Blast (1/Day)
entries: The fallen archon blows its buisine to emit a thunderous blast in a 60-foot cone that is audible 600 feet away. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. Creatures and objects made of glass or crystal have disadvantage on the saving throw and take 108 ({@damage 24d8}) thunder damage instead of 54 ({@damage 12d8}).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harbinger archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the hangman tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal oak tree with vines.

trait.name: Rooted
entries: The hangman tree has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would pull, push, or knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hangman tree makes three Tendril attacks. It can use Bite or Swallow in place of one Tendril attack.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) and pulled upward 10 feet toward the hangman tree. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, can't breathe, and the hangman tree can automatically hit the target with its tendril attack. The hangman tree has nine tendrils, each of which can grapple only one target.

Each tendril can be attacked (AC 10; 15 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the hangman tree, which can use an action to grow a replacement tendril. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 14} Strength check against it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature it is grappling with. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The hangman tree makes one Bite attack against a target. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the hangman tree, and it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the hangman tree's turns. A hangman tree can have up to four Small or two Medium creatures swallowed at a time.

If the hangman tree takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the hangman tree must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the hangman tree. If the hangman tree dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Enfeebling Spores (3/Day)
entries: The hangman tree releases spores from its flowers that extend outward in a 60-foot-radius cloud. The spores spread around corners and lingers in the air for 1 minute. Each creature that is completely within the cloud at the start of its turn must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw against poison. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the cloud after 4 rounds. A strong wind (at least 20 miles per hour) disperses it after 1 round.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the halimaw can use its action to polymorph into its Fiend Form or back into its true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the halimaw appears as a Large demonic boar-humanoid hybrid. Its statistics, other than its size, AC, Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form at dawn or if it dies. While transformed, the halimaw also gains the following features.

items: The halimaw's creature type changes to fiend.
The halimaw has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the halimaw gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
If the halimaw starts its turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, it becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Charge (Fiend Form Only)
entries: If the halimaw moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The halimaw has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The halimaw makes two Dagger attacks (humanoid form) or three attacks. one with its Tusks and two with its Claws (fiend form).

action.name: Tusks (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw against poison. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, unless it is immune to poison. Otherwise, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a failed save.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Charm (3/Day)
entries: One humanoid the halimaw can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the halimaw's verbal commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this halimaw's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The halimaw can have up to three targets charmed at a time. If it charms a fourth one, the effect on the first target ends.

trait.name: Captivating Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the naga must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the naga for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 60 feet away from it. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to the naga's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

trait.name: Chameleon Scales
entries: Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to see the naga have disadvantage, and the naga has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide, as the color of its scales constantly shifts to match its background, providing perfect camouflage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the naga fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The naga has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Greater Spell Penetration
entries: When the ha-naga casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 5 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes two melee attacks: one with its Bite and one to Constrict. Alternatively, it can make one Constrict attack and cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on saving throws made against the naga's spells, and the naga can't constrict another target.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring only verbal components and Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The naga moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Coil Whip (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga whips its tail around it. Each creature within 15 feet of the naga must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, pushed up to 10 feet away and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Stinger (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The naga attacks with its Stinger.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The duwende has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts And Plants
entries: The duwende can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the anito shared a language.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 15/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: The duwende magically turns invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duwende wears or carries is invisible with it.

reaction.name: Bestow Luck (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the duwende can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, the duwende rolls a {@dice d10} and adds it to the result. The duwende can make this choice after the roll is made but before the outcome is determined.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The duwende casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The duwende has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts And Plants
entries: The duwende can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the anito shared a language.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 15/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: The duwende magically turns invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duwende wears or carries is invisible with it.

reaction.name: Alter Luck (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the duwende can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, the duwende rolls a {@dice d10} and can choose to add it to or deduct it from the result. The duwende can make this choice after the roll is made but before the outcome is determined.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The duwende casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Der Drache kann Tierlaute und humanoide Stimmen imitieren. Eine Kreatur, die die Geräusche hört, kann mit einer erfolgreichen {@dc 14} Weisheitsprüfung ({@skill Insight}) erkennen, dass es sich um Imitationen handelt.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sticky, corrosive acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage immediately and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The gorbel explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The gorbel has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the gorbel's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gorbel attacks with its Claws. If it is grappling with a creature, it can also use its Bite.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the gorbel can automatically hit the target with its claws, and the gorbel can't attack another target with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target it is grappling with. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the golden protector moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golden protector makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The golden protector uses one of the following breath weapons:

action.name: Fire Breath
entries: The golden protector exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 11d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Weakening Breath
entries: The golden protector exhales gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Preserve Life (1/Day)
entries: The golden protector chooses any number of creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. The golden protector restores 75 hit points, divided among the target creatures. The golden protector can restore no more than half of a creature's hit point maximum.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lammasu casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The goblin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Javelin
entries: The goblin makes a Javelin attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell )Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The goblin uses Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Searing Gaze of Maglubiyet (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The goblin turns its gaze toward one creature it can see within 60 feet of it and commands it to combust. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two attacks. one with its Whip and one with its Morningstar. Alternatively, it can make one melee weapon attack and cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it has disadvantage to attack rolls and ability checks until the start of the goblin's next turn.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action asa bonus action on each of its turns.

reaction.name: Scouring Instruction
entries: When an ally that the goblin can see makes a d20 roll, the goblin can roll a {@dice d6} and the ally can add the number rolled to the d20 roll by taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage. A creature immune to psychic damage can't be affected by Scouring Instruction.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The goblin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The goblin makes a Whip or Morningstar attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The goblin uses Spellcasting.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin uses Command Flanking Maneuver, if available. It then makes two Scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. The attack deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage if the goblin has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage if the goblin has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Command Flanking Maneuver {@recharge 5}
entries: The goblin targets up to three allies it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the goblin, the target can use its reaction to move up to half its speed. The target's next attack has advantage until the start of the goblin's next turn.

action.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action asa bonus action on each of its turns.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The goblin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Intimidate Foe
entries: The goblin targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the goblin, it must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the goblin until the end of the goblin's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The goblin makes a melee or ranged attack.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the goblin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin uses Battle Orders. It then makes two Battleaxe attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature, the next attack against it by an ally has advantage until the start of the goblin's next turn.

action.name: Battle Orders
entries: The goblin targets up to three allied goblins it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the goblin, the target's next attack roll, ability check, and saving throw has advantage until the start of the goblin's next turn.

action.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can takes the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action asa bonus action on each of its turns.

bonus.name: Battle Tactics
entries: The goblin targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the goblin, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack, move up to its speed, move up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}, or take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The goblin moves up its speed.

legendary.name: Battleaxe
entries: The goblin attacks with its Battleaxe.

legendary.name: Flames of Maglubiyet (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The goblin casts burning hands or fire bolt, if available.

trait.name: Battle Ready
entries: The goblin uses its Intelligence modifier, instead of its Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls when attacking with a weapon (included in the attacks).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two Warhammer attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Summon Steel Defender (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The goblin summons a steel defender in the form of a worg. The steel defender appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of goblin. The steel defender acts right after the goblin using the same initiative count and fights until it is destroyed. It disappears when the goblin dies or when the goblin summons a new steel defender.

action.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

bonus.name: Command Steel Defender
entries: The goblin targets a steel defender it summoned and can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the goblin, the target can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack, or take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, {@action Help}, or Repair action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):

monster.name: Gnoll Witherlock

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the gnoll casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes two melee weapon attacks. It can use Raise Witherling in place of one weapon attack, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or it suffers 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.

action.name: Raise Witherling
entries: The gnoll targets one dead gnoll it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is turned into a witherling and acts immediately after it in the initiative order. The witherling acts as an ally of the gnoll.

action.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a Bite attack.

action.name: Detonate Witherling {@recharge 4}
entries: The gnoll causes one witherling it can see within 60 feet of it to explode and die. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding witherling must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Command Witherling
entries: The gnoll targets one witherling it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the gnoll, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or move up to its speed.

reaction.name: Protective Witherling
entries: When the gnoll is hit by an attack, one witherling within 5 feet of the gnoll must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warlock casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The gnoll gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The gnoll regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The gnoll moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The gnoll casts {@spell eldritch blast} or {@spell toll the dead|XGE}.

legendary.name: Scythe
entries: The gnoll makes a Scythe attack.

legendary.name: Detonate (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The gnoll uses Detonate Witherling, if available.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The witherling makes two attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Club, or two with its Club.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. For every 24 hours that elapses, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 2 ({@damage 1d4}) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 +3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rampage
entries: When the witherling reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the witherling can takea bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a Bite attack.

reaction.name: Vengeful Strike
entries: In response to a gnoll being reduced to 0 hit points within 30 feet of the witherling, the witherling makes a melee attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Savage Jaws of Yeenoghu {@recharge 5}
entries: The gnoll conjures disembodied spectral heads of Yeenoghu that immediately bite the gnoll's foes. Each enemy creature within 30 feet of the gnoll must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) piercing damage and is {@condition frightened} until the end of the gnoll's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a Bite attack.

reaction.name: Boon of Yeenoghu (2/Day)
entries: The gnoll grants a + {@hit 5} bonus to an attack roll made by an allied creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the attack hits, it is a critical hit. The gnoll can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

entries: The gnoll uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Presence of Refnara
entries: While under a moonless night sky, each ally within 60 feet of the gnoll has advantage on Bite attacks and saving throws against being charmed and {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Bite

action.name: Rampage

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The gnoll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: The gnoll makes two attacks, either with its Glaive or its Longbow.

action.name: Bite (Humanoid Form Only)

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Giant Hyena Bite (Giant Hyena Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a Bite attack.

bonus.name: Swift Shapechanger
entries: The gnoll polymorphs into a Giant Hyena, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus.name: Marked by Gorellik
entries: The gnoll targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and makes that creature its mark. The target remains the gnoll's mark for 1 minute, or until either the target or the gnoll drops to 0 hit points.
The gnoll has advantage on all attack rolls against its mark and has disadvantage on all attacks against a different target while it has a mark.

reaction.name: Parry and Counter
entries: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, it must be able to see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the gladiator can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within its reach.

legendary.name: Attack

legendary.name: Intimidating Presence
entries: The gladiator targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the gladiator, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the gladiator for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to gladiator's Intimidating Presence for the next 24 hours.

They remain for 1 hour, until they or the giant dies, or until the giant dismisses them as an action.
